name: Salvation (ireneyang)
description:
Inspired from Beat Saber, I tried to make a hell version. 

The coming organs stand for the seven different scenes. The opening hand means yourself also openness. There's destroy after their collisions, this process can be regarded as accept your sins. 

In this scene, the player can control the hand on x-axis with left and right button on the keyboard and try to destroy as many organs as possible. 

I also tried camera switch and scale changing function in this scene, it didn't work very well. 

Next step would be how to make the positions of those coming organs generate randomly.
